summary: Tested translation fixes for EN/PL/NL languages on Script Generator page and karaoke subtitle generation. All translations verified working correctly. Backend karaoke tests all passed.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Translations for EN/PL/NL on Script Generator page verified working. Karaoke subtitle generation tested with 6 unit tests - all passing. Key test cases: 1) Only one word is yellow at a time per dialogue line, 2) Color codes are correctly applied (H00FFFF for yellow, HFFFFFF for white), 3) Fallback to even distribution when no timestamps provided.

Enter a topic and click Generate

key_verifications: Yellow color code (H00FFFF) correctly applied to current word only
White color reset (HFFFFFF) applied after highlighted word
Each dialogue line has exactly 1 yellow word
